desc: This seminar offers in-depth reading, writing, and discussion on a selected topic from areas common to sociology and anthropology with an emphasis on contemporary analysis and ethics. Specific content will vary from year to year. The seminar is open to senior sociology/anthropology majors only. Offered annually in the spring semester.
name: Senior Seminar
notes: Prerequisite: Completion of BTS-T or permission of instructor. Open to senior Sociology/Anthropology majors only.
